description: The [SocGholish](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1124) JavaScript payload has been delivered within a compressed ZIP archive.(Citation: Red Canary SocGholish March 2024)(Citation: Secureworks Gold Prelude Profile) [SocGholish](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1124) has also single or double Base-64 encoded references to its second-stage server URLs.(Citation: SentinelOne SocGholish Infrastructure November 2022)

external_references.description: Milenkoski, A. (2022, November 7). SocGholish Diversifies and Expands Its Malware Staging Infrastructure to Counter Defenders. Retrieved March 22, 2024.
Red Canary. (2024, March). Red Canary 2024 Threat Detection Report: SocGholish. Retrieved March 22, 2024.
